Title: Students demand more access to journalism at NYC public schools
Description: Student journalism opportunities at New York City’s public schools tend to be limited to whiter and more affluent schools – and a group of kids wants to change that.

Title: MTA struggled to answer questions about congestion pricing tolls 5 years in the making
Description: The MTA had difficulty saying whether drivers on the Brooklyn Bridge would be tolled if they went to the FDR Drive going in either direction. At one point, different MTA officials gave different answers.

Title: Brooklyn’s SUNY Downstate hospital saved from closure until at least 2025
Description: Lawmakers rejected Gov. Hochul's proposal to close the facility and replace it with an outpatient clinic.

Title: Families of NYC subway strike victims say bureaucracy is compounding their grief
Description: It can take weeks or months to get a hold of footage, answers around their loved ones' death.

Title: NYC youth voter turnout is always low. Can this digital tool change that?
Description: A new website offers information about voting, community events and opportunities across the city.

Title: NYC asks researchers: What should we do with all this poop?
Description: The department is seeking strategies to deal with the solid waste extracted from its wastewater system.

Title: Celebrate the drop of Taylor Swift's new album at these NYC events
Description: “The Tortured Poets Department” drops Friday at midnight.

Title: NYC street vendors protest City Hall crackdown, urge lifting caps on licenses
Description: Vendors say the enforcement actions were unwarranted.

Title: Lawmakers to allow NYC to lower speed limit to 20 mph
Description: Lawmakers say the change won't apply to some of the city's busiest streets.

Title: Extra Extra: A 65-foot hot dog sculpture is just what NYC needs
Description: Because we love hot dogs, here are your afternoon links: a new skyscraper is coming, a lawsuit against Dunkin', paying for kidney donors, and more from around the city and internet.
